arStrings.szText: Every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds, {c_important}Upheaval{/c} is guaranteed to {c_important}{u}Overpower{/u}{/c} and deals {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage. This timer is reduced by {c_important}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds when {c_important}Upheaval{/c} {c_important}{u}Overpowers{/u}{/c} a Boss or an Elite enemy.
